name: Kitchen Reaction!
description:
Hello,

This is our submission to The Azure Lux Game Jam.

The theme is Chain Reaction.

This is our second ever game, we hope you enjoy it.

Things that we know would be nice to improve or add:

- The ambient (we have it done but sadly there was no time to implement it);

- Some minor bugs;

- General gameplay quality-of-life improvements;

- "Continue Game" feature, integrated with PlayFab;

- Compatibility with resolutions other than 1080p;

Free asset credits:

https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/3d-santa-claus-model-1478073
